alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Bullock; Lee; Macon; Montgomery; Pike; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued November 16 at 8:21PM CST until November 17 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM CST THURSDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 possible. * WHERE...Montgomery, Macon, Bullock, Lee, Russell, Pike and Barbour Counties. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 3 AM to 8 AM CST Thursday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Thursday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Barbour; Bullock; Lee; Macon; Montgomery; Pike; Russell
